desc.cn: 用于重置 Kafka Connect 源连接器偏移量的命令行工具
desc.en: A commandline tool for resetting Kafka Connect source connector offsets

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew tap helpermethod/homebrew-tap \
&& brew install connor

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
x scoop bucket add helpermethod https://github.com/helpermethod/scoop-helpermethod.git \
&& x scoop install connor
